title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting project P2 and attempting to close it, the 'Open/Close project' option is not always available in the Navigator.
EB: The 'Open/Close project' option should always be available in the Navigator when selecting a project to close.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 
2. Select project P2. 
3. Attempt to close project P2 and observe the availability of the 'Open/Close project' option in the Navigator.
